name: Shakir
text: Successful indeed are the believers,

name: Shakir
text: Who are humble in their prayers,

name: Shakir
text: And who keep aloof from what is vain,

name: Shakir
text: And who are givers of poor-rate,

name: Shakir
text: And who guard their private parts,

name: Shakir
text: Except before their mates or those whom their right hands possess, for they surely are not blameable,

name: Shakir
text: But whoever seeks to go beyond that, these are they that exceed the limits;

name: Shakir
text: And those who are keepers of their trusts and their covenant,

name: Shakir
text: And those who keep a guard on their prayers;

name: Shakir
text: These are they who are the heirs,

name: Shakir
text: Who shall inherit the Paradise; they shall abide therein.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We created man of an extract of clay,

name: Shakir
text: Then We made him a small seed in a firm resting-place,

name: Shakir
text: Then We made the seed a clot, then We made the clot a lump of flesh, then We made (in) the lump of flesh bones, then We clothed the bones with flesh, then We caused it to grow into another creation, so blessed be Allah, the best of the creators.

name: Shakir
text: Then after that you will most surely die.

name: Shakir
text: Then surely on the day of resurrection you shall be raised.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We made above you seven heavens; and never are We heedless of creation.

name: Shakir
text: And We send down water from the cloud according to a measure, then We cause it to settle in the earth, and most surely We are able to carry it away.

name: Shakir
text: Then We cause to grow thereby gardens of palm trees and grapes for you; you have in them many fruits and from them do you eat;

name: Shakir
text: And a tree that grows out of Mount Sinai which produces oil and a condiment for those who eat.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely there is a lesson for you in the cattle: We make you to drink of what is in their bellies, and you have in them many advantages and of them you eat,

name: Shakir
text: And on them and on the ships you are borne.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We sent Nuh to his people, and he said: O my people! serve Allah, you have no god other than Him; will you not then guard (against evil)?

name: Shakir
text: And the chiefs of those who disbelieved from among his people said: He is nothing but a mortal like yourselves who desires that he may have superiority over you, and if Allah had pleased, He could certainly have sent down angels. We have not heard of this among our fathers of yore:

name: Shakir
text: He is only a madman, so bear with him for a time.

name: Shakir
text: He said: O my Lord! help me against their calling me a liar.

name: Shakir
text: So We revealed to him, saying: Make the ark before Our eyes and (according to) Our revelation; and when Our command is given and the valley overflows, take into it of every kind a pair, two, and your followers, except those among them against whom the word has gone forth, and do not speak to Me in respect of those who are unjust; surely they shall be drowned.

name: Shakir
text: And when you are firmly seated, you and those with you, in the ark, say: All praise is due to Allah who delivered us from the unjust people:

name: Shakir
text: And say: O my Lord! cause me to disembark a blessed alighting, and Thou art the best to cause to alight.

name: Shakir
text: Most surely there are signs in this, and most surely We are ever trying (men).

name: Shakir
text: Then We raised up after them another generation.

name: Shakir
text: So We sent among them an apostle from among them, saying: Serve Allah, you have no god other than Him; will you not then guard (against evil)?

name: Shakir
text: And the chiefs of his people who disbelieved and called the meeting of the hereafter a lie, and whom We had given plenty to enjoy in this world's life, said: This is nothing but a mortal like yourselves, eating of what you eat from and drinking of what you drink.

name: Shakir
text: And if you obey a mortal like yourselves, then most surely you will be losers:

name: Shakir
text: What! does he threaten you that when you are dead and become dust and bones that you shall then be brought forth?

name: Shakir
text: Far, far is that which you are threatened with.

name: Shakir
text: There is naught but our life in this world; we die and we live and we shall not be raised again.

name: Shakir
text: He is naught but a man who has forged a lie against Allah, and we are not going to believe in him.

name: Shakir
text: He said: O my Lord! help me against their calling me a liar.

name: Shakir
text: He said: In a little while they will most certainly be repenting.

name: Shakir
text: So the punishment overtook them in justice, and We made them as rubbish; so away with the unjust people.

name: Shakir
text: Then We raised after them other generations.

name: Shakir
text: No people can hasten on their doom nor can they postpone (it).

name: Shakir
text: Then We sent Our apostles one after another; whenever there came to a people their apostle, they called him a liar, so We made some of them follow others and We made them stories; so away with a people who do not believe!

name: Shakir
text: Then We sent Musa and his brother Haroun, with Our communications and a clear authority,

name: Shakir
text: To Firon and his chiefs, but they behaved haughtily and they were an insolent people.

name: Shakir
text: And they said: What! shall we believe in two mortals like ourselves while their people serve us?

name: Shakir
text: So they rejected them and became of those who were destroyed.

name: Shakir
text: And certainly We gave Musa the Book that they may follow a right direction.

name: Shakir
text: And We made the son of Marium and his mother a sign, and We gave them a shelter on a lofty ground having meadows and springs.

name: Shakir
text: O apostles! eat of the good things and do good; surely I know what you do.

name: Shakir
text: And surely this your religion is one religion and I am your Lord, therefore be careful (of your duty) to Me.

name: Shakir
text: But they cut off their religion among themselves into sects, each part rejoicing in that which is with them.

name: Shakir
text: Therefore leave them in their overwhelming ignorance till

name: Shakir
text: Do they think that by what We aid them with of wealth and children,

name: Shakir
text: We are hastening to them of good things? Nay, they do not perceive.

name: Shakir
text: Surely they who from fear of their Lord are cautious,

name: Shakir
text: And those who believe in the communications of their Lord,

name: Shakir
text: And those who do not associate (aught) with their Lord,

name: Shakir
text: And those who give what they give (in alms) while their hearts are full of fear that to their Lord they must return,

name: Shakir
text: These hasten to good things and they are foremost in (attaining) them.

name: Shakir
text: And We do not lay on any soul a burden except to the extent of its ability, and with Us is a book which speaks the truth, and they shall not be dealt with unjustly.

name: Shakir
text: Nay, their hearts are in overwhelming ignorance with respect to it and they have besides this other deeds which they do.

name: Shakir
text: Until when We overtake those who lead easy lives among them with punishment, lo! they cry for succor.

name: Shakir
text: Cry not for succor this day; surely you shall not be given help from Us.

name: Shakir
text: My communications were indeed recited to you, but you used to turn back on your heels,

name: Shakir
text: In arrogance; talking nonsense about the Quran, and left him like one telling fables by night.

name: Shakir
text: Is it then that they do not ponder over what is said, or is it that there has come to them that which did not come to their fathers of old?

name: Shakir
text: Or is it that they have not recognized their Apostle, so that they deny him?

name: Shakir
text: Or do they say: There is madness in him? Nay! he has brought them the truth, and most of them are averse from the truth.

name: Shakir
text: And should the truth follow their low desires, surely the heavens and the earth and all those who are therein would have perished. Nay! We have brought to them their reminder, but from their reminder they turn aside.

name: Shakir
text: Or is it that you ask them a recompense? But the recompense of your Lord is best, and He is the best of those who provide sustenance.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely you invite them to a right way.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely those who do not believe in the hereafter are deviating from the way.

name: Shakir
text: And if We show mercy to them and remove the distress they have, they would persist in their inordinacy, blindly wandering on.

name: Shakir
text: And already We overtook them with chastisement, but they were not submissive to their Lord, nor do they humble themselves.

name: Shakir
text: Until when We open upon them a door of severe chastisement, lo! they are in despair at it.

name: Shakir
text: And He it is Who made for you the ears and the eyes and the hearts; little is it that you give thanks.

name: Shakir
text: And He it is Who multiplied you in the earth, and to Him you shall be gathered.

name: Shakir
text: And He it is Who gives life and causes death, and (in) His (control) is the alternation of the night and the day; do you not then understand?

name: Shakir
text: Nay, they say the like of what the ancients said:

name: Shakir
text: They say: What! When we are dead and become dust and bones, shall we then be raised?

name: Shakir
text: Certainly we are promised this, and (so were) our fathers aforetime; this is naught but stories of those of old.

name: Shakir
text: Say: Whose is the earth, and whoever is therein, if you know?

name: Shakir
text: They will say: Allah's. Say: Will you not then mind?

name: Shakir
text: Say: Who is the Lord of the seven heavens and the Lord of the mighty dominion?

name: Shakir
text: They will say: (This is) Allah's. Say: Will you not then guard (against evil)?

name: Shakir
text: Say: Who is it in Whose hand is the kingdom of all things and Who gives succor, but against Him Succor is not given, if you do but know?

name: Shakir
text: They will say: (This is) Allah's. Say: From whence are you then deceived?

name: Shakir
text: Nay! We have brought to them the truth, and most surely they are liars.

name: Shakir
text: Never did Allah take to Himself a son, and never was there with him any (other) god-- in that case would each god have certainly taken away what he created, and some of them would certainly have overpowered others; glory be to Allah above what they describe!

name: Shakir
text: The Knower of the unseen and the seen, so may He be exalted above what they associate (with Him).

name: Shakir
text: Say: O my Lord! if Thou shouldst make me see what they are threatened with:

name: Shakir
text: My Lord! then place me not with the unjust.

name: Shakir
text: And most surely We are well able to make you see what We threaten them with.

name: Shakir
text: Repel evil by what is best; We know best what they describe.

name: Shakir
text: And say: O my Lord! I seek refuge in Thee from the evil suggestions of the Shaitans;

name: Shakir
text: And I seek refuge in Thee! O my Lord! from their presence.

name: Shakir
text: Until when death overtakes one of them, he says: Send me back, my Lord, send me back;

name: Shakir
text: Haply I may do good in that which I have left. By no means! it is a (mere) word that he speaks; and before them is a barrier until the day they are raised.

name: Shakir
text: So when the trumpet is blown, there shall be no ties of relationship between them on that day, nor shall they ask of each other.

name: Shakir
text: Then as for him whose good deeds are preponderant, these are the successful.

name: Shakir
text: And as for him whose good deeds are light, these are they who shall have lost their souls, abiding in hell

name: Shakir
text: The fire shall scorch their faces, and they therein shall be in severe affliction.

name: Shakir
text: Were not My communications recited to you? But you used to reject them.

name: Shakir
text: They shall say: O our Lord! our adversity overcame us and we were an erring people:

name: Shakir
text: O our Lord! Take us out of it; then if we return (to evil) surely we shall be unjust.

name: Shakir
text: He shall say: Go away into it and speak not to Me;

name: Shakir
text: Surely there was a party of My servants who said: O our Lord! we believe, so do Thou forgive us and have mercy on us, and Thou art the best of the Merciful ones.

name: Shakir
text: But you took them for a mockery until they made you forget My remembrance and you used to laugh at them.

name: Shakir
text: Surely I have rewarded them this day because they were patient, that they are the achievers.

name: Shakir
text: He will say: How many years did you tarry in the earth?

name: Shakir
text: They will say: We tarried a day or part of a day, but ask those who keep account.

name: Shakir
text: He will say: You did tarry but a little-- had you but known (it):

name: Shakir
text: What! did you then think that We had created you in vain and that you shall not be returned to Us?

name: Shakir
text: So exalted be Allah, the True King; no god is there but He, the Lord of the honorable dominion.

name: Shakir
text: And whoever invokes with Allah another god-- he has no proof of this-- his reckoning is only with his Lord; surely the unbelievers shall not be successful.

name: Shakir
text: And say: O my Lord! forgive and have mercy, and Thou art the best of the Merciful ones.
